name: Bison Pepperoni Macaroni
author: The Bison Council
summary: Chopped bison sausage with pepperoni seasoning is blended into this extra cheesy macaroni and cheese dish.
ingredients: ½ cup chopped green pepper or frozen peas
¼ teaspoon salt or to taste
1 ½ cups shredded American and Cheddar cheese blend
4 ounces bison sausage with pepperoni seasoning, chopped
directions: Cook macaroni according to package directions, adding green pepper or peas during the last 3 minutes of cooking; drain
Meanwhile, for sauce, melt butter over medium heat in a large skillet
Cook onion in hot butter for 4 to 5 minutes or until onion is tender
Stir in flour, salt, and black pepper
Whisk constantly until thick and bubbly
Cook, whisking constantly, for 2 more minutes
Add American & cheddar cheese blend and mozzarella cheese, stirring until sauce is smooth and cheese is melted
Stir the sauce and bison pepperoni into the pasta
